channel.title: No idea
channel.description:
'The coordinates of quadrilater PRAT are P(a,b), R(a,b+3), A(a+3,b+4), and T(a+6,b+2). Prove that RA is parallel to PT.'
Helping me out and showing work would be nice :).

item.title: No idea
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Assign values to a and b and then draw the it on a piece of math paper. Then you have proof, but if your teacher isn’t a complete retard he’ll probably wants an explanation that’s worth something.

Read full topic
